Optional suggestion (not tested):
```suggestion
    v.IsEquiv v' â†” âˆ€ {x y : K}, v x < v y â†” v' x < v' y := by
  simp only [IsEquiv, le_iff_le_iff_lt_iff_lt]
```

```suggestion
    [LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Î“'â‚€] {v : Valuation K Î“â‚€} {v' : Valuation K Î“'â‚€} :
```

I use `(v v')` here to be aligned with `isEquiv_of_val_le_one` and other lemmas. @urkud Do you think changing all `(v v')` into `{v v'}` is a good idea? I will make the change in a new PR if you think this is a good idea.
I'll open a new PR to change parenthesis in similar lemmas.
